display_long_description:
Laugh, Jump, or Scream... It’s all part of the fun!  Face towering heights, crawling terrors, and robotic murder clowns as you test your courage!                                                       [media]
🔥 **Explore the Ten Unique NOPE CHALLENGES!**

Featuring Robotic Clowns, Heights, and Spiders, each with Light, Moderate, or EXTREME intensity. Everyone reacts differently—what’s easy for one may terrify another. Most say clowns aren’t scary, but our data proves **Dioko** makes players **NOPE** out fastest! Hit the **NOPE Button** when it’s too much and retreat to the **Breather Space** with Mr. Peels and Coco before diving back in.
[media]
🔥 **New Mixed Reality Challenge: REALITY BREACH!**

Welcome, Test Subject! You’re among the first to witness the **NOPE Core**, a prototype built to amplify fear itself. But something’s gone wrong. The **Core** is unstable, collapsing into your real space. Defend it as robotic clowns and crawling horrors breach reality, closing in on you. The **NOPE Core** is volatile, “buggy,” and maybe even alive… so if things glitch, just blame the breach.

🆘 **Your Escape: The NOPE Button & Breather Space**

When fear takes over, hit the **NOPE Button** to recover. Relax in the Breather Space with **Mr. Peels** and **Coco**, whom you rescue from their own phobias.

**Health and Safety Warning**

**NOPE CHALLENGE** contains content which some users may find frightening or intense. Users should refer to the in-game EULA and Safety Guidelines to limit the risk of serious injury or harm.
